comment: Extract the first member of an ordered pair. Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 42. (See ~ op2ndb to extract the second member, ~ op1sta for an alternate version, and ~ op1st for the preferred version.) (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2003.)
